content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It's quite close to all important facilities such as supermarket, public transportation, etc. Now, I'm sure you'll understand that such a prime location doesn't come cheap. Let's start with 1000 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Dear Mr. Schmidt, the apartment is really nice but it is not furnished. Therefore, I would like to propose a rent of 800 euros per month. I am a dependable and responsible tenant. I am also a student, so I can assure you that I will take good care of the apartment. I hope we can find a solution that works for both of us.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you're a student and furnishing an apartment can be costly. However, the location of the apartment is prime, and the demand is high. I am willing to negotiate, but I can't go as low as 800 euros. How about 900 euros? It's a fair price for such a location, and it's a good deal for you too.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Dear Mr. Schmidt, 900 euros is a better price but still too high for me. I propose a rent of 850 euros per month. I am willing to pay a deposit of two months' rent if we can agree on this price. Thank you.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your willingness to pay a deposit, but 850 euros is still too low for me. This apartment is in high demand, and I have other potential tenants who are willing to pay more. However, I can offer you 880 euros per month, which is the lowest I can go. This is a fair price for such a prime location, and I hope we can find common ground.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Dear Mr. Schmidt, 880 euros is a better price. I accept your offer. I agree to the price of 880 euros per month. Thank you.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of [880] Euro!

name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
